Reviews.Title: "Thumbs Up"
Reviews.Author: Ralphie "Ralph"
Reviews.Content: I saw this phone and was impressed with his sleek look. At the same time I was looking for a phone (as a gift) both for my sister and her husband and my MOM to replace the damaged phones they currently had. Well I went a head and researched the phone...Loved what I found in my research. So I went ahead and make my purchase with confidence....and I'm very pleased so far.

ProductInfo.Features:
Specifications -
Display - TFT, 256K colors (Type); 128 x 160 pixels, 1.77 (Size); Second external STN monochrome display (96x96 pixels)
Alert Types - Vibration, Polyphonic, and MP3 Ringtones
Phonebook - up to 1000 entries
Internal Memory - up to 9 MB
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung E2210 Hello Kitty Cell Phone Quad-band - Unlocked
